explanations.neural network: The paper proposes a Deep Neural Network (DNN) design to model the introduction of CBDC and its impact on commercial banks' deposits.
explanations.deep learning: The study uses deep learning techniques, specifically a Deep Neural Network (DNN), to forecast the likelihood of bank runs.
explanations.deep neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of a Deep Neural Network (DNN) for modeling and forecasting purposes.
explanations.DNN: The abbreviation DNN is used in the title and abstract to refer to the Deep Neural Network approach employed in the study.
